section.name: Main goals
section.p: These goals define in the broadest sense what Hippo ECM will provide as a whole.

subsection.name: Usability, extendibility, interoperability, integration and administration
subsection.p: The Hippo Content Platform will be easy to understand, use, extend, integrate with external systems, and administer.

subsection.name: Central point for information management
subsection.p: Hippo ECM will act as a central point for information management, with its main focus on a generic content repository that allows for integration with a diverse set of applications.
